item.title: Week 1
item.description: Week 1 Learning Log (May 19–23, 2025) # 1. Objectives # FPGA Architecture & Tools Understand FPGA internal architecture: CLBs (LUTs, muxes, flip-flops), on-chip SRAM/Block RAM Install and configure Vivado/Vitis 2022.
